channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Melissa expected to rapidly intensify into major hurricane in the Caribbean
item.description: Cuba, the Dominican Republic, Haiti and Jamaica are bracing for Hurricane Melissa. The storm is expected to quickly grow into a powerful category 3 or...

item.title: Hurricane Melissa strengthens into Category 2 storm in the Caribbean
item.description: Melissa strengthened into a Category 2 hurricane on Saturday and is expected to bring "catastrophic" flash flooding and landslides to Jamaica, Haiti a...

item.title: A humming annoyance or jobs boom? Life next to 199 data centres
item.description: Data centres were billed as a boon to Virginia’s economy. Now, residents are concerned about their impact on real estate and electricity costs.

item.title: Sudan's fertile region where food is rotting amid famine and war
item.description: The Jebel Marra area is neutral in the war but its produce cannot get out to feed a hungry nation.

item.title: 'Heroes of Kharkiv': How 48 children were saved from kindergarten hit by Russian drone
item.description: The story of a dramatic and heroic rescue that has captured the public imagination in Ukraine.

item.title: Trump hikes tariffs on Canada by another 10% in response to anti-tariff ad
item.description: The move comes even though Ontario's leader said the anti-tariff ad would be halted beginning Monday.

item.title: 'Brothers in the forest' - the fight to protect an isolated Amazon tribe
item.description: Peru's Mashco Piro face a struggle to survive in the 21st Century, but locals want to help them.

item.title: 10/21: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Breaking down threats against Rep. Hakeem Jeffries; Reporter's Notebook: Trump's White House renovations

item.title: June Lockhart, actor known for "Lassie" and "Lost in Space," dies at 100
item.description: June Lockhart, the actor best known for her role as the matriarch in the TV series "Lassie", has died, her family spokesperson said Saturday.

item.title: Charity boss arrest in BBC sex-for-aid investigation 'gives women strength'
item.description: Syrian refugees in Turkey allege they were taken advantage of when they were desperate for help.

item.title: Paris cemetery draws millions to American rock star's grave
item.description: Père Lachaise Cemetery draws three million visitors a year for a most unusual tourist attraction in the heart of Paris. Barry Peterson has the story.

item.title: The White House movie theater demolition ends a storied era in presidential history
item.description: The vintage movie venue was destroyed this week as part of the Trump administration's plan to build a new $300 million ballroom. Former President Bill...

item.title: Trump threatens Canada with 10% extra import tax over anti-tariffs ad
item.description: The ad, which used the words of former President Ronald Reagan to criticize U.S. tariffs, aired during a World Series game. Trump said that Ontario's ...

item.title: First, came the Louvre heist. Then came the memes

In emotional speech, Zohran Mamdani defends Muslim identity against ‘racist and baseless’ attacks
